title: Designer identification (Manzanita font)
content:
Does anybody know who was the designer of "Manzanita" font?   
   
...and what is its real copyright status?   
   
...In what foundry is it available? (I noted that the free versions are   
knock-offs with a really poor kerning).   
   
Thanks!   
   
   
Ramiro Espinoza
author: ramiro
